name: photo-of-the-day-brit-britt-doing-what
title: Photo Of The Day: Brit & Britt Doing What?
author: Morgan Levy
excerpt: So it’s possible that your Nashvillest editors went to the Nicki Minaj/Britney Spears show at the Bridgestone Arena last night. It’s also possible that we saw Britney Spears give Titans wide receiver Kenny Britt a lap dance on stage and then drive away backstage with him in a sparkly pink convertible. Just maybe, that’s what happened. Photo by @rayzate.
contentEncoded:
So it’s possible that your Nashvillest editors went to the Nicki Minaj/Britney Spears show at the Bridgestone Arena last night. It’s also possible that we saw Britney Spears give Titans wide receiver Kenny Britt a lap dance on stage and then drive away backstage with him in a sparkly pink convertible. Just maybe, that’s what happened.

Photo by @rayzate.
